settings.question: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.question: How long will it take to get my orders?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.question: Any question?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.

settings.question: Where do you ship?
settings.answer: We offer shipping to the contiguous United States and Canada. We are able to ship anywhere in the world. If you live outside of North America, shipping costs will be automatically calculated at checkout.

settings.question: How much does shipping cost?
settings.answer:
Standard shipping is free in the contiguous United States and in Canada. If you live on the island territories or Northern Canada your shipping charges will be calculated at checkout.

If you live elsewhere in the world, your shipping charges will also be calculated at checkout.

Expedited and express shipping costs will be calculated at checkout.

settings.question: Do I need to pay duties?
settings.answer:
If you live in the United States or Canada, you will not be charged import duties. You may be charged state or provincial taxes in accordance with local laws. These will be calculated at checkout.

If you reside internationally, you may be charged additional duties and taxes. These are incurred at the customerâ€™s expense.

settings.question: When will I receive my order?
settings.answer:
We offer free standard shipping, and expedited shipping. Please remember that your order will take time to process before it ships. Even if you select expedited or express shipping, your order will take a few days to be processed through our system:

Free Standard shipping: Delivery time: 4-6 business day

Expedited shipping:Delivery time: 3 business days

Express shipping:Delivery time: 1-2 business days
